Title: Mock Two Piece Evening Dress

----

Sku: CD484

----

Price: 

----

Saleprice: 

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 2, 4, 6, 10, 8

----

Colors: mint, cream

----

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: CD484-mint-mock-two-piece-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: A mock two piece in the back with a center piece in the front. Princess neckline with a slight cutout at the bust and cut outs on the sides that lead to the open back. The back piece and the edging of the bodice are beaded . An ankle length skirt with a high split in the front.
